proposal:
idea_implementation: Create or update the file config/docker-compose.yml with this complete content:

version: "3"
services: 
  db:  
    image: postgres:12  
    volumes:    
      - ./data:/var/lib/postgresql/data      
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: NeonPostgreSQL
      POSTGRES_USER: youruser
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: yourpass
  api-server:
    build: .
    ports:  
      - "8000:8000" # Frontend port, not used in this plan. Replace with actual frontend service if needed.
    depends_on: [db]
